title: New Intranet Portal Launched
content: The company has launched a new internal portal for staff to communicate and access tools.

title: Q2 Strategy Briefing Scheduled
content: Management will present the Q2 business strategy this Friday at 10 AM in the main conference room.

title: IT Maintenance Completed
content: All systems are back online after routine maintenance performed over the weekend.

title: Wellbeing Workshop Next Week
content: Join the HR team for a wellbeing session focused on managing stress and work-life balance.

title: Coffee Machine Upgrade
content: New bean-to-cup machines have been installed in all break rooms across the building.
